products.title: Bella Blackout Pear Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout pear green roller blind in green. Made to measure from 8.77 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!
This medium pear green roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This green roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Bella Mirage (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bella mirage (blackout) blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3048mm
 	min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric composition: polyester
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included

products.title: Bella Blackout Pear Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout pear green electric roller blind in green. Made to measure from 123.62 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This pear green electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electirc roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. The bright pear green of this fabric will look stunning when paired with natural and darker wooden tones and will beautifully compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.
